column2: <dt lang="en">I would like to examine you now</dt>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">xiãn zãi wô gêi nî zuò jiân chá </dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">xiãn zãi wô gêi nî zuò jiân chá </dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Ngo bong lei gim cha, tak mou?</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Wah giam cha ler, eh sai bue?</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">wô lái géi nî liáng tî wën</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">wô lái géi nî liáng tî wën</dd>
<dd lang="ms">mari saya periksa suhu badan kamu</dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Ngo bong lei leong tai wen</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Wah lai ga ler giam cha wun dor</dd>
<dt lang="en">I want to check your blood pressure</dt>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">wô yão gêi nî liáng xuè yä </dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">wô yão gêi nî liáng xuè yä </dd>
<dd lang="ms">saya hendak periksa tekanan darah kamu</dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Ngo bong lei leong huit arh</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Wah ai giam cha ler eh huit wu gnuai bo</dd>
<dt lang="en">I want to check your throat</dt>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">wô yão jiân chá nî dè hóu lóng</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">wô yão jiân chá nî dè hóu lóng</dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Ngo yew gim cha lei gei hao long</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Wah ai giam cha ler eh ao leng</dd>
<dt lang="en">Please open your mouth, stick out your tongue</dt>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">qîng zhäng dã nî dè zûi</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">qîng zhäng dã nî dè zûi</dd>
<dd lang="ms">sila ngangakan mulut dan keluarkan lidah anda</dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Cheng mai hoi lei gei zui ba</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Kwee chui, ji cng chut lai</dd>
<dt lang="en">Let me look at your tongue</dt>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">rãng wô kãn nî dè shé tóu</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">rãng wô kãn nî dè shé tóu</dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Bei ngo tai ha lei tew lei</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Hor wa knua ler eh ji</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">qíng bâ yï fú tuö xiã lái</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">qíng bâ yï fú tuö xiã lái</dd>
<dt lang="en">May I listen to your chest?</dt>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">wô xiâng tïng nî dè xiöng kôu </dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">wô xiâng tïng nî dè xiöng kôu </dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Ngo yew tang ha lei gei fei</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Wah eh sai tnia ler eh heng bor boh?</dd>
<dt lang="en">Please lie down on the bed</dt>
<dt lang="en">Breath in and out through your mouth</dt>
<dt lang="en">Does it hurt when I press?</dt>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">shì yä dè shí hòu tòng mä </dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">shì yä dè shí hòu tòng mä </dd>
<dt lang="en">Where does it hurt more, here or there?</dt>
<dd lang="cmn-Hans">哪里最疼痛？这儿或那儿？</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">ná lî zuì téng tòng? zhè ér huò nã ér</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">ná lî zuì téng tòng? zhè ér huò nã ér</dd>
<dd lang="ms">di mana lebih sakit? Sini atau sana?</dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Bin do zui tong? Li do/Gor do?</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Toh loh kah tnia, jit dao (here) ah see hit dao (there)?</dd>
<dt lang="en">Would you please stand up straight with your back towards me?</dt>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">qîng zhãn lì, bèi cháo xiãng wô </dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">qîng zhãn lì, bèi cháo xiãng wô </dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Cheng kei hei sun, bui hueang ngo</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Eh sai kia tit-tit, ga jia hiong wah bue?</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">gão sù wô ná lî tòng</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">gão sù wô ná lî tòng</dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Tong ngo gong bin do tung</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Ga wa gong di dou loh tnia</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">qîng nî xiãng chuäng kôu zôu guò qù </dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">qîng nî xiãng chuäng kôu zôu guò qù </dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Cheng hang do chueang hou bin</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Ler eh sai knia qke tang kau bue?</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">qîng wän nî dè xî gãi </dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">qîng wän nî dè xî gãi </dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Wan lei gei sud tou gor</dd>
<dt lang="en">Does it hurt when I move here?</dt>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">wô zhuân dòng zhè ér shí huì tòng mä </dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">wô zhuân dòng zhè ér shí huì tòng mä </dd>
<dd lang="ms">sakitkah bila saya alihkan bahagian ini?</dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Ngo yoke li do wui tong mou?</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">wah din dang jit dau eh tnia buey?</dd>
<dt lang="en">Follow my finger with your eyes</dt>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">yân jïng gën zhè wô dê shôu zhî kãn</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">yân jïng gën zhè wô dê shôu zhî kãn</dd>
<dd lang="ms">ikut jari saya dengan mata kamu</dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Ngan jing gun ngo sau ji mong</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Eng ler eh bak jiu teh wah eh qiu zhai</dd>
<dt lang="en">Touch your nose with your finger</dt>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">yòng shôu chù mö nî  dè bí zî </dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">yòng shôu chù mö nî  dè bí zî </dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Yong sau more lei bei gor</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Eng qiu zhai lai dong ler eh pnee</dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">kê yî gân jué dão mä </dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">kê yî gân jué dão mä </dd>
<dt lang="en">Does it feel the same on each side?</dt>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_NEW">liâng biän gân jué yï yãng mä </dd>
<dd lang="cmn-Latn_OLD">liâng biän gân jué yï yãng mä </dd>
<dd lang="yue-Latn_OLD">Leong bin gum kok yat yeung ma?</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">neng peng gum kok sio siang boh?</dd>
<dd lang="nan-Latn_OLD">Ler eh kah giah ki lai</dd>
<dt lang="en">Do the same as I do</dt>
